Package yaak.agent

This package implements agent operations.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AgentContext AgentContext provides an agent "context" (place, environment, depending on your preferred terminology) accessible via its service methods.
 

Class Summary
Agent Agent is the base agent, that is, the common agent data type that every agent must extend in order to participate in the agent world.
AgentContainer AgentContainer implements AgentContext, providing an agent habitat accessible via the service methods defined by AgentContext.
AgentID AgentID implements an identifier for managing unique access to each agent resident in an agent context.
AgentSystem AgentSystem provides top-level access to agent services, for example, creating an agent context.
ConfigurableAgent ConfigurableAgent adds a default configuration capability.
 

Exception Summary
AgentException AgentException extends YaakException, as a base for reporting agent-related exceptions.
AgentRuntimeException AgentRuntimeException extends YaakRuntimeException, as a base for reporting unchecked, agent-related exceptions.
DuplicateNameException DuplicateNameException reports duplicate agent name violations.
InconsistentStateException InconsistentStateException reports violations in the state of an agent or its container.
 

Package yaak.agent Description

This package implements agent operations.
